document.full_text: female directors, famously shut out of the cannes film festival's main competition in 2010, dominated the opening of this year's event with dark tales of murder, prostitution, rape and suicide.
document.title: women grab cannes spotlight with disturbing tales
lines_and_colors: female directors, famously shut out of the cannes film festival's main competition in 2010, dominated the opening of this year's event with dark tales of murder, prostitution, rape and suicide.
